thread.title: 21 Pictures Of Hot Guys With Puppies That’ll Make You Go ‘Woof’
thread.title_full: 21 Pictures Of Hot Guys With Puppies That’ll Make You Go ‘Woof’

author: Sean Abrams
title: 21 Pictures Of Hot Guys With Puppies That’ll Make You Go ‘Woof’
text:
Like Us On Facebook Like Us On Facebook 
There are a few simple pleasures in life that immediately turn my frown upside down without question (in no particular order): 
1. A Cheesy Gordita Crunch. 
2. Watching someone take a hard tumble. 
3. Butt stuff. 
4. When my Jewish mother makes empanadas. 
5. The smile (and body) of an adorable man snuggling up close to an even more adorable puppy. Dog Dresses Up In Iconic Red Carpet Looks   
While it’s difficult to appropriately rank how much each of those things excites me, number five usually takes the cake when it comes to filling me with joy and inappropriate arousal. 
And because today just so happens to be National Puppy Day, I’ve decided there’s never been a more appropriate time to wrangle up the hottest gentlemen I could find who are sitting right next to man’s best friend. 
Hot guys with puppies just naturally make the world go ’round. 
And now, let the drooling begin. How much would it cost to switch spots with that puppy? Instagram I’d never leave this bed… like, ever. Instagram I’m not quite sure which one I want to pet first. Instagram That puppy has no idea how lucky it is right now. Instagram Man buns, puppies AND patriotism? I mean, come on now. Instagram I wish someone would look at me the way this guy looks at his puppy. Instagram How weird would it be to ask this veterinarian for a physical? Instagram *insert smoking hot fireman pun here* Instagram Oh, is it time for our bath already? Instagram If this dog doesn’t hump the shit out of this guy, I will. Instagram Breakfast for three, please. Instagram I wonder how long it took to teach that puppy how to do the “Blue Steel” look. Instagram That guy is so hot, the puppy is shook. Instagram I certainly wouldn’t mind waking up to this every morning. Instagram This is the one type of mirror selfie I would approve of. Instagram When will a guy carry me around like that? Instagram Show up at my door like that, and I’ll never want you to leave. Instagram Isn’t this the cutest family photo you’ve ever seen? I don’t even know where to look first in this one. Instagram Nothing to see here — just a gorgeous man and his pup. Instagram That cute puppy is blocking that even cuter guy’s face. Do you think he’s single? Instagram 
Yes, the last one is me. 
Yes, I know I’m the cutest one on this list. 
And yes, I am single and will bring the dog on our date. Why Having A Pet Is Better Than Being In A Relationship [GEN WHY]
